mapper.insert: insert into board_post(board_no, member_no, board_kinds, board_writer, board_title, board_date, board_hit, board_content) values(seq_board_no, #{member_no}, #{board_kinds}, #{board_writer}, #{board_title}, sysdate, 0, #{board_content})
mapper.select: select * from board_post where board_kinds = #{board_kinds} and board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update board_post set board_hit = board_hit + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
update board_post set board_kinds = #{board_kinds}, board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_update_date = sysdate where board_no = #{board_no}
